title.value: Экономическая эффективность и энергетическая оценка возделывания проса на зерно в Гродненской области [Беларусь]
Economic efficiency and energy estimation of millet cultivation for grain in the Grodno area [Belarus]
Economic efficiency and energy estimation of millet cultivation for grain in the Grodno area [Belarus]

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Chekut, E.V., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: Economic and energy evaluation of millet (Panicum miliaceum) production of variety Bystroe in Grodno region of the Republic of Belarus for 2005-2011 was made. It was determined that in case of the crop yielding capacity at the level more than 40 сentner/ha the corn prime cost reduces up to 20000 Belarusian rubles/ha, the profit and crop yield rate increase corresponding to 490000 Belarusian rubles/ha or 55%. Cultivation of millet of Bystroe variety for grain can be legitimately considered energetically effective as it promotes reception of energy consumption production within the limits of 272,0-493,8 MJ/c and values of bioenergetic coefficient within the limits of 2,8-5,1 units.
